name: Ituran Location and Control Ltd.
description: Ituran Location and Control Ltd. is a leading provider of location-based services and telematics solutions, specializing in the automotive and transportation industries. Founded in 1995, the company has established itself as a pioneer in developing innovative solutions for vehicle tracking, fleet management, and theft recovery. Ituran operates primarily in Israel, Brazil, and other international markets, offering a comprehensive suite of products that includes GPS tracking systems, mobile applications, and advanced analytics tools. The company’s technology enables clients to monitor vehicle locations in real-time, optimize fleet operations, and enhance security measures. In addition to its core services, Ituran also provides solutions for insurance companies, helping them manage risk and improve customer engagement through telematics data. With a focus on technological advancement, Ituran continues to drive growth by investing in R&D, aiming to expand its service offerings and enhance user experience. The company's commitment to customer satisfaction and operational excellence has positioned it as a trusted partner in the telematics industry, serving a diverse range of clients from individual car owners to large corporate fleets. Ituran’s mission is to leverage technology to improve safety, efficiency, and connectivity in transportation, making it a crucial player in the ongoing evolution of mobility.
